English: Selling coins doesn't do anything. But, if coins are in a stack with#other cards, you cannot sell the stack. Enabling this mod makes#selling stacks with coins in them possible.#Very useful after a Forest raid.

Normally, you cannot sell shells on the mainland or sell coins#on the island. Enabling this setting turns shells into coins on#the mainland and coins into shells on the island.#This setting only works if the Allow Sale of Coins/Shells#setting is ON.
